doc.title: Great Robbery
doc.plot: A Zamindar attempts to pull heist over a devastating Earth together again so everyday he prays to god to shower blessings upon him for him to be successful in his motive. God does assure him and tell him that the earth can be rid of evilness. But when he sets out into the world a precious jewel is snatched from Lord Venkateshwara murti. The jewel is stolen and falls into the devil's hand although the villagers are aware of the thief they are ask to keep a low profile and the evilness continues on earth especially in India with no one to stop it now except god.
